posts.text:
Til Sölu Hátalarar og Bassabox  frá Lg 5.1
http://www.lg.com/uk/home-cinema-system ... ema-system
Ekki spilarinn sjálfur
, hann dó.
Hörku fínir hátalarar.  
Gæti verið ca. 7 ára, keypt notað.
Speaker position 	Front and Rear
Power consumption 	Power Consumption: 50 Watt Power-off Consumption: 1W UNDER
Front speaker sound output (Initial Max Power) 	45W x 2(4Ω)
Centre speaker sound output (Initial Max Power) 	45W (4Ω)
Rear speaker sound output (Initial Max Power) 	45W x 2(4Ω)
Subwoofer sound output (Initial Max Power) 	75W(3Ω)
Verðhugmynd 0 kr.
